sentences.sContent: Our only choice in the matter is whether to accept it amicably, or be dragged, kicking and screaming, into the next chapter of our existence.
sentences.sContent_eng: Our only choice in the matter is whether to accept it amicably, or be dragged, kicking and screaming, into the next chapter of our existence.
sentences.sCn: 我们唯一能选择的是是否要友好地接受改变，亦或者被拖着，踢着尖叫着进入我们生活的新篇章。

sentences.sContent: If the Parties amicably settled the Dispute bythemselves, they shall enter into a settlement agreement in writingand to be duly executed by the Parties.
sentences.sContent_eng: If the Parties amicably settled the Dispute bythemselves, they shall enter into a settlement agreement in writingand to be duly executed by the Parties.
sentences.sCn: 如各方自行友善解决争议，各方应签订书面的解决协议并依约履行。
